verses.verse: When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> whose <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and you succeed <S%H3427>them,<s%> and dwell in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in their <S%H1004>houses;<s%>

you shall set <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for you in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> you the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and divide the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> causes you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> into three <S%H8027>parts,<s%> that every <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> may flee <S%H5127>there.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>case<s%> of the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> that shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> there and <S%H2425>live:<s%> whoever <S%H5221>kills<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unawares,<s%> and <S%H8130>didn't<s%> hate him in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past;<s%>

as when a man <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H3293>forest<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> to <S%H2404>chop<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> fetches a <S%H5080>stroke<s%> with the <S%H1631>axe<s%> to cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H1270>head<s%> <S%H5394>slips<s%> from the <S%H6086>handle,<s%> and <S%H4672>lights<s%> on his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies;<s%> he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H2425>live:<s%>

lest the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H310>manslayer,<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3179>hot,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H1870>him,<s%> because the way is <S%H7235>long,<s%> and strike <S%H5315>him<s%> <S%H5221>mortally;<s%> whereas he was not <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> inasmuch <S%H3588>as<s%> he <S%H8130>didn't<s%> hate him in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past.<s%>
Therefore I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, You shall set <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> cities for <S%H5892>yourselves.<s%>

If <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> your <S%H1366>border,<s%> as he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives<s%> you all the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

if you <S%H8104>keep<s%> all this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6680>it,<s%> which I command you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H3117>ever<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> then you shall <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> more for <S%H7969>yourselves,<s%> besides these three:

that <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> not be <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of your <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and so blood be on <S%H1818>you.<s%>

But if any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H6965>him,<s%> and rises up against <S%H5221>him,<s%> and strikes him <S%H5315>mortally<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies,<s%> and he <S%H5127>flees<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%>

then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> him <S%H5414>there,<s%> and deliver him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H1197>him,<s%> but you shall put away the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that it may go well with <S%H2895>you.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5253>remove<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1366>landmark,<s%> which they of old <S%H7223>time<s%> have <S%H1379>set,<s%> in your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which you shall <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against a <S%H376>man<s%> for any <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> or for any <S%H2403>sin,<s%> in any <S%H2399>sin<s%> that he <S%H2398>sins:<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> or at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> shall a <S%H1697>matter<s%> be <S%H6965>established.<s%>
If an <S%H2555>unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6030>testify<s%> against him of <S%H5627>wrongdoing,<s%>

then <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H582>men,<s%> between whom the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H5975>is,<s%> shall stand <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H8199>judges<s%> who shall be in those <S%H3117>days;<s%>

and the <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall make <S%H3190>diligent<s%> <S%H1875>inquisition:<s%> <S%H5707>and,<s%> behold, if the witness is a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness,<s%> and has <S%H6030>testified<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> against his <S%H251>brother;<s%>

then you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he had <S%H2161>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to his <S%H251>brother:<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

Those who <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> no more <S%H1697>any<s%> such <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity:<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
